item.title: iSport
item.description: This is an Android application, written in Java, for the athletes in Cambridge. It gives a daily weather forecast information on the most relevant weather, based on the user’s selection of sports. I was responsible for layout design and interaction functionalities, and built an aesthetic, easy-to-use and efficient user interface.
